doc.field: Personal Reminiscences of Mrs. William S. Packer Jr., (Mary K. Packer) Part I, 123 page Typescript. Paper Yellowing; Table of Contents Includes John Browns Raid, Nomination of Abraham Lincoln, the First Battle of Bull Run, Gettysburg, Effect of War on the school, and other notable events in Civil War Era.
